1076840.name: The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart -Art Book-
1076840.description:
The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart -Art Book- What's Nora?
36 Pages / Full Color

The official art book for The Princess, The Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart. This book features detailed illustrations of the characters and their various outfits, complete with character profiles. An in-depth look at Sakuragabuchi and surrounding worlds with gorgeous illustrations of the backdrops. Fully translated lyrics to the songs featured in the compelling soundtrack. This book is a must have companion for any fan of this game series.
1076840.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
